attributes.action: Ensure the UK’s exit from both The Single Market & Customs Union in March 2019.
attributes.additional_details: Customs Union prevents the U.K. from negotiating our own trade deals around the world (outside the 28 member state EU). While the Single Market means that we are subjected to ECJ regulations, and free movement of people-unlimited.
attributes.background: Ensure that the government negotiates the UK’s exit from both The Single Market and Customs Union, while having no similar affiliation to both, for example, declining ‘A Customs Union’.
